TopicTitle: Odd issue in KSC to VAB scene change

Articles.Content: Anyone else seen this? Launch vessel. Recover vessel. Go from post-recovery KSC scene to VAB. The last flight scene of the recovered craft briefly shows, then normal VAB. This is new with 1.2.2.

@tater

I've had similar things happen in previous versions. After running KSP for an extended period of time, the screen will "glitch/flash" a different screen during scene change. It's very common for me after a few hours of gameplay, but it usually doesn't cause any problems (other than annoyance and seizures)
